Record.definition: CREATE OR REPLACE EDITIONABLE PROCEDURE "PPM"."CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS_INS_SP" ( P_PERMISSION_CODE IN VARCHAR2, P_PERMISSION_NAME IN VARCHAR2, P_PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION IN VARCHAR2, P_IS_SYSTEM IN NUMBER, P_IS_ACTIVE IN NUMBER, P_CREATED_BY IN NUMBER DEFAULT 1 ) IS V_ID NUMBER; BEGIN SELECT CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS_S1.NEXTVAL INTO V_ID FROM DUAL; INSERT INTO CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS ( ID, PERMISSION_CODE, IS_ACTIVE, IS_SYSTEM, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY ) SELECT V_ID, P_PERMISSION_CODE, P_IS_ACTIVE, P_IS_SYSTEM, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY, SYSDATE, P_CREATED_BY FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 'PERMISSION EXISTS ALREADY' FROM CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS WHERE PERMISSION_CODE = P_PERMISSION_CODE); CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS_INS_SP ( 'CMN_SEC_PERMISSIONS', V_ID, P_PERMISSION_NAME, P_PERMISSION_DESCRIPTION, P_CREATED_BY, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL ); END;
